trans-unit.source: Wraps an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> whose execution is initialized by an event.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> cuja execução é inicializada por um evento.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: It is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> that is used to handle an event; typically it can be raised from the host or by the runtime in response to a delay timer expiring.
trans-unit.target: É um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> que é usada para manipular um evento; normalmente ele pode ser gerado do host ou pelo tempo de execução em resposta a um timer de atraso expirando.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> is inherited from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>; therefore, it is a sequence that has the additional restriction that the first activity should be an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> é herdada do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>; portanto, é uma sequência que tem a restrição adicional que a primeira atividade deve ser um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> é um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, que significa que o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> pode conter outras atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> is similar to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> activity, with some additional characteristics.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> é semelhante de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> atividade, com algumas características adicionais.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> must have a parent that is either a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, or <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> deve ter um pai que é uma <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, ou <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The first child of an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activity must be an activity that inherits from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro filho de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> atividade deve ser uma atividade que herda de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.

trans-unit.source: All subsequent children can be activities of any type.
trans-unit.target: Todos os filhos subsequentes podem ser atividades de qualquer tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> blocks and waits for the pending occurrence of some events, such as starting a timer or the arrival of a message.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> bloqueia e aguarda a ocorrência pendente de alguns eventos, como iniciar um timer ou a chegada de uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: When the event occurs, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> finishes running and then all subsequent activities are executed.
trans-unit.target: Quando o evento ocorre, o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> termina em execução e, em seguida, todas as demais atividades são executadas.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> contains an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> has some restrictions:
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> contém um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> tem algumas restrições:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> may contain one, and only one, activity of type <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> pode conter uma e apenas uma atividade do tipo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> must be the first child activity.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> deve ser a primeira atividade filho.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> cannot be in the event handler for a child activity and cannot be a child to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> if the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> is not the first child.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> não pode ser no evento manipulador de uma atividade filho e não pode ser um filho de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> se o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> não é o primeiro filho.

trans-unit.source: As long as the first activity is the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>, the event handler can contain any activities.
trans-unit.target: Como a primeira atividade é o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>, o manipulador de eventos pode conter todas as atividades.

trans-unit.source: If an activity other than <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> is contained in <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, that activity cannot have an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Se uma atividade de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> está contida no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, que a atividade não pode ter um manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: For example, an activity that supports event handling can be used inside the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> but the activity cannot have event handlers attached to itself.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, uma atividade que dá suporte à manipulação de eventos pode ser usada dentro de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> , mas a atividade não pode ter manipuladores de eventos anexados a mesmo.

trans-unit.source: Another example is that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> can contain a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>, but the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> itself cannot contain any <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> classes.
trans-unit.target: Outro exemplo é que o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> pode conter um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>, mas o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> em si não pode conter nenhum <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> classes.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> to perform state machine transitions.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> para executar as transições de máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo do arquivo StateMachineWorkflow.cs SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Máquina de estado simples](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como criar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> classe.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo do arquivo StateMachineWorkflow.cs SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Máquina de estado simples](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).

trans-unit.source: The user-identified name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome definido pelo usuário da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" /> usando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the event activity that drives the change.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a atividade de evento que orienta a alteração.

trans-unit.source: The event activity that drives the change.
trans-unit.target: A atividade de evento que orienta a alteração.
